trends: There have been no other sightings in Portland
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: sighting detailsi was at home taking pictures of a plane from behind living room window on top floor of my house, above the street lights there was a plane coming towards my direction, i usualy take alot of snap shots of planes in order to catch ufo's as i've become interested over the years. the ufo was not visible to eyes nor the beam it projected (that looked like a searching light from its behaviour) the object and the beam was later found in the pictures as i viewed them i used an iphone app called camera plus for fast snap shots per second which explains the bad quality of the pictures. i notice there is only 3 picture slots available for upload so i will put the most enough to clearly show the beam search light. i still dont know if what i have is a glare or solid object what makes it hard to determine is the beam it casts on the foor with no cars on the street, or any other means it could have been there. this is for an analyst to confirm ufo or phenomenon. i would like to be contacted if anyone working for mufon comes up with an analysis thank you. >>> i highly suggest downloading \ saving these pictures on your computer and then rotating through them fast using the arrow keys to see change and movement. the beam and the ufo above it beside the building, it's a dark dot. also the plane i was originly taking pictures of is in the middle above a street light it looks like a bright light (that is the plane light it was faced towards me, it's not the ufo) p.s i never saw the object to lose sight of it with eyes it was in the picture after i uploaded them to the computer.
Summary: spheric small - drone like looked small so maybe unmanned. Casted a beam that scnaned clockwise around area
